document_data.name: Flashburst
document_data.mainbody: '''''Flashburst''''' was a potent and dazzling [[spell]], capable of disorienting and blinding its targets with a brilliant burst of light.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell emitted a dazzling flash of light, automatically dazzling creatures within {{SI|120|ft|long=yes}}. This burst of light caused temporary blindness in the affected creatures.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[somatic]], [[verbal]], and a [[material component]]. The material component was pinch of either [[phosphorus]] or [[sulfur]].
document_data.Usage: The spell was developed by the [[Red Wizards]] of [[Thay]] where it was considered a common spell. Otherwise, it was very rarely used.
